```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
y1<- c(5.60, 6.80 ,8.32, 8.70, 7.64, 7.44, 7.48, 7.80 ,7.72, 8.40 ,6.98 ,8.00)
y2<- c(5.04, 7.38, 5.56, 6.96, 8.30, 6.86, 5.62, 7.22 ,5.72, 6.40 ,7.54 ,7.50)
y3<- c(8.36, 7.04, 6.92, 8.18, 6.20, 6.10, 2.75, 8.14 ,9.00, 8.64 ,6.60 ,8.18)
y4<- c(8.30, 8.54, 7.68, 8.92, 8.46, 7.38, 8.08, 8.12 ,8.68, 8.24 ,8.09 ,8.06)
y <- c(y1,y2,y3,y4)
A <- as.factor(rep(c("o1","o2","o3","o4"),each= 12))
boxplot(y~A)
lmy <- lm(y~A)
summary(lmy)
box <- y %>% as.data.frame() %>% cbind(rep(c("o1","o2","o3","o4"),each= 12))
colnames(box) <- c('strength','operator')
library(rCharts)
p3 = rPlot(x = 'operator', y = 'box(strength)', data = box, type = 'box')
p3$print(include_assets=T)
```
